net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.component.composite

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.notification.DelegatingNotification
      • net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.component.composite.Message
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Notification

    public class Message
extends DelegatingNotification
    A message to display to the user.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)

      • Message

        public Message(NotificationType type,
               LocalizedObjectKey key,
               java.lang.Object... arguments)
        Create a new instance using a text key and optional arguments.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of message.
        key - the key defining the message.
        arguments - the arguments to use when resolving the key, may be empty. See LocaleContext.getLocalizedText(LocalizedObjectKey, Object[]) .

               TextSource text)
        Create a new instance.
        Parameters:

        text - the text of the message.

      • isHTML

        public boolean isHTML()
        Get if the message text and details are using HTML.
        Returns:
        true if using HTML, false if using plain text.

      • setExpireTime

        public void setExpireTime(long expireTime)
        Set the time at which this message expires and should be removed. Normally this property does not need to be set, see MessageContainer.add(Message[]).
        Parameters:
        expireTime - the milliseconds since the Java epoch.
